sections.title: Overview
sections.description: Quick access to the most critical security settings and system status
sections.overview: This section provides a dashboard view of your security configuration with the most important settings that affect overall system behavior. Use this for quick adjustments and monitoring.

sections.title: Arbiter & 3-Branch System
sections.description: Configure Arbiter weights and branch coordination for v2.0.0 architecture
sections.overview: The Arbiter coordinates three detection branches: Pattern Detection (Branch A), Heuristics (Branch B), and NLP Analysis (Branch C). Adjust branch weights, thresholds, and priority boosts to balance accuracy and performance. Higher weights give more influence to specific branches in final decisions.

sections.title: File Manager
sections.description: Download and upload configuration files with audit logging
sections.overview: Manage configuration files directly by downloading current versions or uploading modified files. All file operations are logged in the audit log for security and compliance tracking.

sections.title: Webhook and Plugin
sections.description: Configure webhook security and browser extension settings
sections.overview: Manage configuration for the Vigil Guard browser extension. Set webhook URL, GUI address, and enable/disable plugin integration. Browser extensions automatically fetch this configuration on install and refresh every 5 minutes.
